summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3926 for the improvement of West Hanford Street, from East Marginal Way to East Waterway; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47798, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
